content.rendered: TTE received a certificate of appreciation from Hitachi Cooling & Heating MEA recently. Rajendra Kumar Verma, Division Head for Trading was presented the certificate by Shivanand S., Regional Business Development Manager at Hitachi DX & VRF. As main distributors, TTE is proud to bring multi-zone climate control technology, with Hitachi VRF and ducted splits to the region.
